definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: As the winds did those of the upper air.
sentences.chinese: 正如秋风把花瓣在空中扬散。

sentences.english: An elephant can uproot a tree or pick a flower without bruising a petal.
sentences.chinese: 大象能够拔起大树，或者摘下小花而不损伤花瓣。

sentences.english: When he saw when the petals fell like a piece of them out of meat.
sentences.chinese: 当他看到花瓣掉了的时候，像是自己身上掉了块肉。

sentences.english: The flower girls carpeted the floor with rose petals before the bride's entrance.
sentences.chinese: 新娘进来前，花童以玫瑰花瓣撒满了地板。

sentences.english: Bud film contract and leaf long, lozenge or wedge, have notch shape a tooth-like part of anything.
sentences.chinese: 苞片约与花瓣等长，菱形或楔形，具缺刻状齿。

sentences.english: With the petals in your mouth, spring atmosphere pervades mouthful.
sentences.chinese: 将花瓣含在嘴里，让满嘴都是春的气息。

sentences.english: Do not intoxicating fragrance of the bamboo flowers, petals small, white and delicate and charming.
sentences.chinese: 竹花没有醉人的馨香，花瓣很小，洁白而楚楚可怜。

sentences.english: Its too small petals small, almost invisible.
sentences.chinese: 它太不起眼了，花瓣儿小得几乎看不见。

sentences.english: A porcelain Guanyin seated on a lotus flower over breaking waves.
sentences.chinese: 一尊瓷观音端坐在莲花瓣上，莲花下是波涛纹。

sentences.english: ZhangLiHua said want to petals in the shower parents brought up.
sentences.chinese: 张丽华便说想要花瓣淋浴以报父母养育之恩。

sentences.english: It is evening, and the time for the flowers to close their petals.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚了，是花瓣合起的时候了。

sentences.english: Sunflowers are large flowers with yellow petals.
sentences.chinese: 向日葵是长着黄色花瓣的大花。

sentences.english: Light permeates the sheer petals of a Madagascar periwinkle.
sentences.chinese: 灯光透过了一朵马达加斯加长春花的纤薄的花瓣。

sentences.english: It tends to have a mellow bouquet and excellent aroma, with golden leaf of SAKURA flower.
sentences.chinese: 优雅的香味，芳醇的美味，含有樱花瓣形的金片。

sentences.english: From all directions Winds bring petals of cherry Into the grebe lake.
sentences.chinese: 从各个方向，风带来鲜红的花瓣，把它吹向湖面。

definition: to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
